c74object.name: fluid.audiotransport~

div.p: Interpolates between the spectra of two sounds using the Optimal Transport algorithm
See Henderson and Solomonm (2019) AUDIO TRANSPORT: A GENERALIZED PORTAMENTO VIA OPTIMAL TRANSPORT, DaFx

method.name: reset
method.digest: Return the object to its original state
method.description: Calling reset will change parameter values back to those the object was created with, i.e. any attribute values set in the box will be retained

div.p: FFT settings consist of three numbers representing the window size, hop size and FFT size in samples:
The hop size and fft size can both be set to -1 (and are by default), with slightly different meanings:

ul.li: For the FFT size, -1 = windowSize snapped to the nearest equal / greater power of 2 (e.g. windowSize 1024 => fftSize 1024, but windowsSize 1000 also => fftSize 1024)
FFTSize, if != -1, will set to the next greatest power of two > 4
The maximum manual FFT size is limited to the value of the maxfftsize initialization argument
if FFT size != -1, then window size is clipped at FFT size
